marklogic.body: I see. (Obligatory Adult Moment ahead) Just, you know, be careful with that stuff. While those things aren't as outright lethal as many other drugs they can still have negative affects on your health. Any time you put any chemical in your body, especially when it's not being monitored by a doctor, it could be dangerous. DXM can really screw with your memory and do stuff like give you Tremors. And as , if you're gonna do any drugs, be careful about the environment you're in at the time. I can't even count the number of times I've had friends get seriously hurt or attacked or something because they were high in the wrong place with the wrong people. It's not that I think you don't already know this stuff, it's just that I'd hate for anything to happen to you in the Off chance that you didn't know it. Best wishes.
